author: hwright
msg: Remove more code duplication in libsvn_wc.
(do_open): Instead of checking the format file manually, just call
svn_wc_check_wc(), wrapping it with the appropriate error.

author: hwright
msg: Fold a function into it's only call site, and remove a bit of code duplication.
(svn_wc_ensure_adm3): ...this.  Also, use the existing format check to
determine if a working copy exists or is new enough.
(svn_wc_check_wc): Remove a comment referencing a nonexistent function.

author: hwright
msg: Simplify wc format checking: if you attempt to use a wc-ng client with an
earlier version of the working copy, Subversion will bail and tell you how
(svn_wc__check_format): Bail on any format earlier than wc-ng.
